newsitem.title: USA: Parametric stake cut by Amerindo group.
newsitem.headline: Parametric stake cut by Amerindo group.

text.p: A group including Amerindo Investment Advisers Inc said on Friday it reduced its stake in Parametric Technology Corp to 5.89 percent or 7,475,000 common shares.

In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the San Francisco-based group said it sold 1,176,592 shares of Parametric between September 5 and October 22 at prices ranging from $45.25 to $53.625 a share.
The group holds its stake for investment purposes.
Parametric is a Waltham, Mass.,-based developer of software used to automate the mechanical product development process.
